description:
Between the Living World and the Demon World, a tunnel is being carved that could usher in darkness and chaos. In a bold move, Sensui begins his search for the person that will finally allow him to complete the tunnel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eroarea. Poarta spre lumea spiritelor rele
Semari Kuru Kyoufu! Makai no Tobira
迫り来る恐怖! 魔界の扉
